Body:
cosmic_ray_image = np.array([[False, False, False, False], [False, False, 
    False, False], [False, False, False, False], [False, False, False, True]])
mask = msk.Mask.from_cosmic_ray_image(shape=(4, 4), frame_geometry=ci_frame
    .FrameGeometry.euclid_top_right(), cosmic_ray_image=cosmic_ray_image,
    cosmic_ray_diagonal_buffer=2)
assert (mask == np.array([[False, False, False, False], [False, True, True,
    True], [False, True, True, True], [False, True, True, True]])).all()
